data.title: Best Hungarian films of all time
data.meta_description: Piero Scaruffi:  Best Hungarian films of all time
data.text:
8.5 Bela Tarr: Werckmeister Harmoniak/ Werckmeister Harmonies (2000)

8.0 Bela Tarr: Satantango/ Satan's Tango (1994)

7.8 Gyorgy Palfi: Hukkle/ Hiccups (2002)

7.6 Istvan Szabo: Tuzolto Utca 25/ 25 Firemen St (1973)

7.6 Bela Tarr: Panelkapcsolat/ Prefab People (1982)

7.5 Bela Tarr: A Torinoi Lo/ The Turin Horse (2011)

7.4 Laszlo Nemes: Saul Fia/ Son of Saul (2015)

7.4 Istvan Szabo: Mephisto (1981)

7.4 Istvan Szabo: Bizalom/ Confidence (1979)

7.3 Bela Tarr: Karhozat/ Damnation (1988)

7.2 Gyorgy Palfi: Taxidermia (2006)

7.2 Gabor Body: Amerikai Anzix/ American Postcard/ American Torso (1975)

7.2 Istvan Szabo: Edes Emma Draga Bobe - Vazlatok Aktok/ Sweet Emma Dear Bobe - Sketches Nudes (1992)

7.2 Bela Tarr: Oszi Almanach/ Autumn Almanac (1984)

7.2 Lili Horvat: Felkeszules Meghatarozatlan Ideig Tarto Egyuttletre/ Preparations to Be Together for an Unknown Period of Time (2020)

7.2 Miklos Jancso: Szegenylegenyek/ Round-up (1965)

7.2 Nimrod Antal: Kontroll (2003)

7.2 Kornel Mundruczo: Feher Isten/ White God (2014)

7.2 Kornel Mundruczo: Pieces of a Woman (2020)

7.1 Istvan Szabo: Hanussen (1988)

7.1 Istvan Szabo: Apa/ Father (1966)

7.1 Denes Nagy: Termeszetes Feny/ Natural Light (2021)

7.0 Marta Meszaros: Naplo Gyermekeimnek/ Diary For My Children (1984)

7.0 Gyorgy Palfi: Mindorokke'/ Perpetuity (2021)

7.0 Gyorgy Palfi: Final Cut - Holgyeim es Uraim / Final Cut - Ladies and Gentlemen (2012)

7.0 Bela Tarr: A Londoni Ferfi/ The Man From London (2007)

7.0 Laszlo Nemes: Napszallta/ Sunset (2018)

7.0 Milorad Krstic: Ruben Brandt, a Gyujto/ Ruben Brandt Collector (2018)

7.0 Ildiko Enyendi: Az En XX Szazadom/ My Twentieth Century (1989)

Frequently mentioned but not my favorites (yet):

Miklos Jancso: Csand es Kialtas/ Silence and Cry (1968)

Peter Bacso: A Tanu/ The Witness (1969)

Istvan Darday: Jutalomutazas/ The Prize Trip (1974)

Marta Meszaros: Orokbefogadas/ Adoption (1975)

Zoltan Fabri: Az Otodik Pecset/ The Fifth Seal (1976)

Zoltan Fabri: Korhinta/ Merry-go-round (1956)

Gyorgy Palfi: Szabadeses / Free Fall (2014)
